ke ha is my favorite singer of all time.

content.text: Hi! How's your day been?
It's been nice! I'm spending time with my mom and celebrating her cancer victory.
Oh wow, congrats to your mom! How long did she fight cancer for?
About a year, it was a rough time. But she's been in remission for three months now.
That's amazing! I'm so happy for her.
Thanks! I'm really excited to spend more time with her.
That's great! I'm sure you'll make the most of it.
I definitely will!
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a graphic designer. I just moved to New York City to study in a prestigious design school.
Oh wow, that's awesome! I've always been interested in graphic design.
It's a lot of fun! I love being able to create things with my own hands.
What are your favorite things to design?
I love designing logos and branding. I also really enjoy designing websites.
Those sound like really fun things to do!
They are! I'm really lucky to have a job that I love.
Yeah, it sounds like you're really passionate about your work.
I am! I love being able to create things that people will enjoy looking at.
Well, it sounds like you're going to do great things in the future.
Thanks! I'm hoping so!
